column4: I was wondering if when I'm using a windows machine if I can also see the desktop gui through SSH?
It's on my local network, I was just told it's possible through SSH and so that's why I asked the question the way I did. Thanks a alot :)
What should I use, like which is the best choice?
It's user's preference.  I've used cygwin and like it well enough, but it can be clunky.
